Texts.Eng:
Aquatic creatures resembling the Mermaids of Earth legends. They are avid swimmers, and skilled with spears and tridents.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Energy x^green;1.2^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;40^reset;% Ice
  ^cyan;Swim Boost 2^reset;

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  ^green;Oceanic^reset; and ^green;tidewater^reset; biomes: Defense x^green;1.25^reset;
  In water/darkwater: +^green;20^reset;% Physical Resistance, ,^green;Poison Immunity^reset;, Oxygen Immunity, Health x^green;1.25^reset;
  Rain grants very slight regeneration.

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Spear/Trident: Damage x^green;1.2^reset; when above ^green;75^reset;% health
  Spear/Trident/Shortspear: +^green;8^reset;% Speed, +^green;4^reset; Defense, +^green;1^reset;% Crit


^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;40^reset;% Electric
